publisher.value: Health Level Seven International (Health Care Devices Work Group)

description.value: Concept status within the ISO/IEEE 11073-10101 Nomenclature.

definition.value: Terms with provisional reference identifier and term code that may be used for development and interoperability testing. Provisional terms shall not be released in production devices.
Terms that got final approval for inclusion to RTMMS. Approved terms may be used in production devices.
Provisional terms that didn't get final approval. Reference identifier and term code will not be allocated to new terms.
Terms that are included in in a revision of the IEEE 11073-10101 standard.
Deprecated terms shall be removed from use in production devices.
Use of withdrawn terms shall be indicated as an error.
